episode: I was not given a promotion at work that I have been trying for and I am feeling quite disappointed and frustrated.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I was not given a promotion that I have been trying for at work and I am feeling quite disappointed and frustrated.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm really sorry to hear that. It's tough when you work hard for something and don't get it. Do you want to talk about what happened?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes it really is tough!  I thought I had a really good chance at this promotion but did not receive it.  It was given to someone with more time at the company than me which is understandable, but I really had my heart set on it.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I get it, that's really tough. It can be so disheartening. Maybe there's a chance for feedback or another opportunity soon?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I am sure there will be.  That is what I have been telling myself.  I am trying to stay positive but it is quite the letdown.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's understandable to feel let down. Keep your chin up—your time will come!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I like your positivity!  I know you are right.  I am doing my best to keep my head up and stay positive about the future.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Glad to hear it! You've got this!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Thank you!  I do not feel as though I really did anything wrong.  I did my best and I guess that is all I could have really done in the situation.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Exactly, you did your best, and that's what counts!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes I really did.  I tried my hardest.  I am working on doing something nice for myself to help me with the disappointment.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds like a great idea! Treat yourself—you deserve it!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Maybe I will go to a baseball game or do something fun this weekend to help take my mind off of the situation.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds perfect! Enjoy yourself!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Thank you.  Do you have any other suggestions for ways to deal with letdown and disappoinment?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Sure! Chat with friends, exercise, or start a new hobby.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Those are some good ideas.  The weather has been much nicer lately so maybe I can start walking and running on the pathway that goes through town.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds perfect! Enjoy the fresh air!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I definitely will.  Thank you for the help I am starting to feel better about the entire situation.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Glad to hear that! Keep going!
